none: Particular draughts of some of the chief African Islands in the Mediterranean, as also in the Atlantic and Ethiopic Oceans : drawn from the most approv'd foreign maps & charts, and regulated by astronl. observations
Accurate map of the islands of Malta, Goze & Cuming.
Accurate chart of Cape de Verd Islands
Plan of the Dutch Fort at the Cape of Good Hope.
Correct map of the Island of St. Hellena.
18 x 22 cm or smaller, sheet 43 x 50 cm
[Printed for W. Innys, R. Ware etc.?]

An accurate map of the islands of Malta, Goze & Cuming. Scale [ca. 1:220,000] -- An accurate chart of Cape de Verd Islands : being an improvement of Captn. Roberts's draught. Scale [ca. 1:1,900,000] -- The Bay of Agoa de Saldanha. Scale [ca. 1:120,000] -- Island of Teneriffe -- A plan of the Dutch Fort at the Cape of Good Hope -- A draught of Table Bay -- [Island of Madera] -- A correct map of the Island of St. Hellena [sic] : belonging to the English East India Company / by Eman. Bowen. Scale [ca. 1:160,000].; Maps include geographical notes, bar scales in English miles and compass roses.

Scales differ ; Conic projection. ; Relief shown pictorially.; Probably from: A complete system of geography / by Emanuel Bowen. London : Printed for W. Innys, R. Ware etc., 1747.; "No. 68"--Lower right corner of sheet.; Cape Verde Islands longitude is measured from Cape Verde.; Area: Malta; Tenerife; Cape Verde Islands; St. Helena; Madeira.; Maps show islands, mountains, forested areas, rivers, coastal waters, anchoring places and settlements.
